headline: Hilton Bolsters Athens Presence with Three Lifestyle Hotels; The first Tapestry Collection by Hilton and Curio by Hilton hotels in the Greek Capital are set to open in 2025 and 2026
summary: ATHENS - Hilton has confirmed plans to open three properties in Athens following franchise agreements with Aluma Greece IKE. Adia Aluma Athens, Curio Collection by Hilton and Anise Aluma Athens,...
